questions.question: What is the name of Ross's pet monkey?
questions.explanation: Ross introduces the monkey as Marcel when he brings it to Monica and Rachel's apartment.

questions.question: Where did Ross get his pet monkey?
options: A lab where his friend Bethel worked
questions.correct_answer: A lab where his friend Bethel worked
questions.explanation: Ross mentions that his friend Bethel rescued the monkey from a lab.

questions.question: Why did Joey not get the job as Santa?
options: Some fat guy's sleeping with the store manager
He did not have the right costume
He was late to the interview
questions.correct_answer: Some fat guy's sleeping with the store manager
questions.explanation: Joey explains that he did not get the job because some fat guy was sleeping with the store manager.

questions.question: What is the name of the song Phoebe sings about her mother's suicide?
questions.correct_answer: The song is not explicitly named in the transcript, but it contains the lyrics 'My mother's ashes / Even her eyelashes / Are resting in a little yellow jar'
questions.explanation: Phoebe sings a song about her mother's suicide, but the song title is not explicitly mentioned.

questions.question: Why did Phoebe stop singing at Central Perk?
questions.explanation: Phoebe stops singing because two scientists, Max and David, are having a loud conversation.

questions.question: What does David tell Phoebe he wants to do to her?
options: Sweep her off her feet and throw her down on the table
questions.correct_answer: Sweep her off her feet and throw her down on the table
questions.explanation: David tells Phoebe that he wants to sweep her off her feet and throw her down on the table.

questions.question: Why does David decide not to go to Minsk?
options: Because Phoebe asks him to stay
Because he gets a better job offer
Because he falls in love with Phoebe
Because Max decides to go without him
questions.correct_answer: Because he falls in love with Phoebe
questions.explanation: David decides not to go to Minsk because he has fallen in love with Phoebe.

questions.question: What happens to Rachel at the airport?
options: She gets into a fight with a woman over a cab
questions.correct_answer: She gets into a fight with a woman over a cab
questions.explanation: Rachel gets into a physical altercation with a woman at the airport over a cab.

questions.question: Who does Joey end up kissing at midnight?
questions.explanation: Joey ends up kissing Chandler at midnight.

questions.question: Why is Fun Bobby sad at the party?
options: Because he missed the countdown to midnight
Because he did not like the party
questions.explanation: Fun Bobby is sad because his grandfather died, and he is still grieving.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman who hits Rachel at the airport?
questions.explanation: The woman who hits Rachel at the airport is described as a 'blonde planet'.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he realizes Marcel is not loving him back?
options: He accepts that Marcel does not love him back and moves on
He continues to care for Marcel despite the lack of affection
questions.correct_answer: He continues to care for Marcel despite the lack of affection
questions.explanation: Ross continues to care for Marcel, even though Marcel is not loving him back.

questions.question: What is the name of the holiday that Chandler hates?
questions.explanation: Chandler hates New Year's because of the pressure to have a date.

questions.question: Who does Phoebe ask to the New Year's party?
questions.explanation: Phoebe asks David to the New Year's party, but later tells him to go to Minsk.

questions.question: What does Janice say to Chandler when he tries to break up with her?
options: She accepts the breakup and leaves
She gets angry and yells at him
She tells him that one of these times will be his last chance with her
She tries to convince him to stay with her
questions.correct_answer: She tells him that one of these times will be his last chance with her
questions.explanation: Janice warns Chandler that one of these times will be his last chance with her.

questions.question: Why does Max decide to go to Minsk without David?
options: Because David does not want to go
Because Max wants to work with Lifson and Yamaguchi and Flench
Because David is in love with Phoebe
Because Max gets a better job offer
questions.correct_answer: Because David does not want to go
questions.explanation: Max decides to go to Minsk without David because David has decided to stay with Phoebe.

questions.question: What does Phoebe tell David to do when he is deciding whether to go to Minsk?
options: She tells him to stay with her
She tells him to go to Minsk
She tells him to follow his heart
She tells him to do what is best for his career
questions.correct_answer: She tells him to go to Minsk
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells David to go to Minsk, even though it means they will have to break up.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman that Joey meets at the store?
questions.explanation: Joey meets a woman named Sandy at the store.

questions.question: Why does Ross's monkey, Marcel, keep shutting him out?
options: Because Marcel is not feeling well
Because Marcel is playing a game with Ross
Because Marcel is walking around dragging his hands
Because Marcel is upset with Ross
questions.correct_answer: Because Marcel is walking around dragging his hands
questions.explanation: Ross mentions that Marcel keeps shutting him out and is walking around dragging his hands.

questions.question: What is the name of the TV host who is counting down to midnight?
questions.explanation: Dick Clark is the TV host who is counting down to midnight.

questions.question: What does Rachel say when she arrives at the party?
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'Vrrbddy, the bll is drrbing' when she arrives at the party, indicating that the ball is dropping.

questions.question: What does Chandler do when he realizes he is alone at midnight?
options: He asks someone to kiss him
questions.correct_answer: He asks someone to kiss him
questions.explanation: Chandler asks someone to kiss him when he realizes he is alone at midnight.

questions.question: Who does Sandy end up with at the party?
questions.explanation: Sandy ends up with Max, the scientist, at the party.

questions.question: What is the reason for the party at Monica and Rachel's apartment?
questions.explanation: The party at Monica and Rachel's apartment is to celebrate New Year's Eve.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do when David tells her he has to go to Minsk?
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells David to go to Minsk, even though it means they will have to break up.

questions.question: What is the name of the grant that Max and David receive?
questions.correct_answer: The grant is not explicitly named in the transcript
questions.explanation: The grant that Max and David receive is not explicitly named in the transcript.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he realizes Marcel is playing with his spatulas?
questions.explanation: Ross lets Marcel continue playing with the spatulas.

questions.question: What is the reason for Fun Bobby's sadness at the party?
options: He missed the countdown to midnight
He did not like the party
questions.explanation: Fun Bobby is sad because his grandfather died.

questions.question: What does Janice do when Chandler tries to break up with her?
options: She accepts the breakup and leaves
She gets angry and yells at him
She tries to convince him to stay with her
She warns him that one of these times will be his last chance with her
questions.correct_answer: She warns him that one of these times will be his last chance with her
questions.explanation: Janice warns Chandler that one of these times will be his last chance with her.

questions.question: What does David write on the whiteboard when Phoebe asks him if he plans to kiss her?
questions.explanation: David writes 'yes' on the whiteboard when Phoebe asks him if he plans to kiss her.

questions.question: What is the name of the city where Max and David are supposed to go for their grant?
questions.explanation: Max and David are supposed to go to Minsk for their grant.

questions.question: What does Phoebe tell David to say to her when he breaks up with her?
options: Your work is your life and that's what you have to do right now
It's tearing me apart, but I have to go to Minsk
questions.correct_answer: Your work is your life and that's what you have to do right now
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells David to say 'your work is your life and that's what you have to do right now' when he breaks up with her.

questions.question: What does David do when he decides to stay with Phoebe?
options: He sweeps the papers off the table and throws Phoebe down on it
He gets down on one knee and proposes to Phoebe
He tells Phoebe that he loves her and will never forget her
He decides to go to Minsk after all
questions.correct_answer: He sweeps the papers off the table and throws Phoebe down on it
questions.explanation: David sweeps the papers off the table and throws Phoebe down on it when he decides to stay with her.
